extendedInfo.description: 4/19/13 Update: We've heard your feedback! The app was crashing on startup for a lot of users recently, and we have managed to squash those bugs and push out an update this Friday, April 19, 2013. Please let us know if you have any more issues with the crash and leave us feedback! Thanks.--------------------------------------------------------------------------KanJam Mobile brings the Official KanJam Rules, How To Play video and an easy to use Scorekeeper to your fingertips.Rules and How To PlayTrying to remember what happens when the flying disc goes in the front and out the top? End the discussion immediately with the KanJam Mobile App! You'll never have to guess how far apart to set the goals again!ScorekeeperKeeping score has never been easier - let the KanJam Mobile App do the work for you. Enter your Player Names to keep score right on your smart phone. The App will automatically declare a winner and even alert you at the key points in the game. Feel like gloating? Post the game results to your Facebook page, and start the rematch with the press of a button.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: The app works well. The video to learn how to play needs to be update to HD quality
reviews.author: Edwin Aguilar

reviews.title: Its great but...

reviews.title: Used to work until ICS
reviews.comment: This app was amazing if you played official KanJam rules. Now that I have Ice Cream Sandwich the app doesn\'t work anymore.  Please fix!!

reviews.title: Great execution but
reviews.comment: We play with house rules, which are clearly common (listed as misconceptions) as a result, I could ONLY use the app if it incorporated them
